meanings.definition: Ornamental work in which holes are cut in fabric and the edges finished with embroidery.
meanings.sent1: The delicate cutwork on the tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the dining room.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate cutwork on the dress at the boutique.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten thought the cutwork on the curtains was a fun new toy.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like cutwork, revealing only fragments of the truth.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the cutwork created a beautiful pattern on the floor.
